# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug428.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug428.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_428/bug428.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> bug428.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_428/bug428.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_428/bug428.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug428.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_428/bug428.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug428.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_428/bug428.cir.prn bug428.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_428/bug428.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug428.cir)
endif()
